v8:item.v8:content: The "Received from" field is displayed in the print form of the cash receipt.
The payment purpose is displayed in the print form of the cash receipt.
The attachment is displayed in the print form of the cash receipt.
The advance payment document that registered the cash issue to an advance holder.
The payment amount in the cash account currency.
The GL account, where you have got the cash from
The cash register where a retail revenue receipt is registered.
The number of the sales slip issued by a fiscal data recorder.
The user who created the cash receipt.
The payment amount in the presentation currency.
The exchange rate multiplier for the currency purchase.
The payment amount in the settlement currency specified in the contract.
The settlement currency exchange rate specified in the contract.
The exchange rate multiplier for the contract's payment currency.
The payment amount in the cash account currency.
The VAT rate applied to the payment.
The early payment discount amount in the cash account currency.
The early payment discount in the settlement currency specified in the contract.
The full text of an additional attribute of String type.
